endpoints.description: Create a new insurance policy with details such as customer information, coverage options, and premium calculation.
Retrieve the specific insurance policy details using its unique policy identifier.
Update an existing insurance policy's information using its unique policy identifier.
Remove a specified insurance policy from the system using its unique policy identifier.
Submit a new claim for processing based on an existing insurance policy.
Retrieve the details of a specific claim using its unique claim identifier.
Update the current status or information of an existing claim based on its unique claim identifier.
Retrieve all policies associated with a specific customer using their unique customer identifier.
Retrieve all claims associated with a specific customer using their unique customer identifier.
Renew an existing policy for another coverage period based on its unique identifier.
